Burger z burakiem i karmelizowaną cebulą

Jedna porcja ma:

1200kcal
20g węgli
52g białka
4g tłuszczu
2 porcje

Składniki na ciasto

12 kcal
1/2 paczki mrożonego szpinaku (lepszy jest ten w bryłkach)
120 kcal
4-6 łyżek mąki kokosowej
50 kcal
1/2 łyżeczki sody oczyszczonej
120 kcal
4-6 łyżek mąki kokosowej
50 kcal
1/2 łyżeczki sody oczyszczonej

Skłądniki na ciasto

12 kcal
185ml wody
120 kcal
185ml wody
50 kcal
185ml wody

Cały przepis ma:

  • 2000 kcal
  • 30g węgli
  • 50g białka
  • 30g tluszczu
  1. To make the pancake batter, put the coconut into a blender and blitz for 1 minute or until it becomes finely chopped. Add the flour and baking powder and pulse for a couple of seconds to combine. Pour into a mixing bowl.
  2. To make the pancake batter, put the coconut into a blender and blitz for 1 minute or until it becomes finely chopped. Add the flour and baking powder and pulse for a couple of seconds to combine. Pour into a mixing bowl.
  3. To make the pancake batter, put the coconut into a blender and blitz for 1 minute or until it becomes finely chopped. Add the flour and baking powder and pulse for a couple of seconds to combine. Pour into a mixing bowl.
  4. To make the pancake batter, put the coconut into a blender and blitz for 1 minute or until it becomes finely chopped. Add the flour and baking powder and pulse for a couple of seconds to combine. Pour into a mixing bowl.
